item.title: Lionsgate Hires Apple TV+’s Justin Manfredi as Head of TV Marketing
item.description: Justin Manfredi is exiting Apple TV+ to join Lionsgate as executive VP of worldwide television marketing. Manfredi succeeds Suzy Feldman, a 10-year veteran of Lionsgate, who is retiring. Manfredi, in

item.title: Lionsgate Marketing Shake-Up: Justin Manfredi to Oversee TV Group as Suzy Feldman Retires
item.description: Manfredi joins Lionsgate from Apple TV+, where he served as a head of series marketing and oversaw campaigns for the ‘The Studio’ and ‘Ted Lasso.’

item.description: Manfredi joins Lionsgate from Apple TV+, where he served as a head of series marketing and oversaw campaigns for the ‘The Studio’ and ‘Ted Lasso.’

item.title: The Twilight Saga Theatrical Rerelease Dates Revealed by Lionsgate
item.description: The Kristen Stewart, Robert Pattinson and Taylor Lautner-led franchise first hit theaters in 2008 with ‘Twilight,’ directed by Catherine Hardwicke.

item.title: ‘Americana’ Director Reacts to Weak Debut, Says Sydney Sweeney Movie “Got Gobbled Up by the Zeitgeist”
item.description: After debate over the Lionsgate film’s opening weekend at the box office, Tony Tost says he is “trying to internalize the many lessons learned.”

item.title: ‘Americana’ Director Reacts to Weak Debut, Says Sydney Sweeney Movie “Got Gobbled Up by the Zeitgeist”
item.description: After debate over the Lionsgate film’s opening weekend at the box office, Tony Tost says he is “trying to internalize the many lessons learned.”

item.title: Lionsgate and Starz Broke Up. Are They Better Off?
item.description: The ‘John Wick’ studio and ‘Outlander’ cabler split to try their luck with Wall Street traders, but neither’s gaining much steam.

item.title: Dylan O’Brien, Diane Lane Spar Over His Girlfriend in Trailer for ‘Anniversary’
item.description: Kyle Chandler and Phoebe Dynevor also star in Jan Komasa’s thriller that hits theaters this fall.

item.title: Black Bear Names Lionsgate Vet David Spitz Head of U.S. Distribution
item.description: Spitz will assist Teddy Schwarzman’s production and financing company — home of numerous Oscar nominees — as it becomes a full-fledged indie studio.

item.title: Lionsgate’s Studio Business Revenue Slides In Earnings After Starz Split
item.description: The newly single Hollywood studio saw overall revenues fall to $556 million, compared to a year-earlier $590.7 million.

item.title: Lionsgate’s Studio Business Revenue Slides In Earnings After Starz Split
item.description: The newly single Hollywood studio saw overall revenues fall to $556 million, compared to a year-earlier $590.7 million.

item.title: Mel Gibson’s ‘Resurrection of the Christ’ to Now Be Two Films That Will Both Open in Spring 2027
item.description: Gibson is directing the follow-up to one of the biggest independent movies of all time, ‘The Passion of the Christ.’

item.title: Lionsgate CEO Jon Feltheimer’s Pay Fell to $9.8 Million in 2025
item.description: The studio boss’s total compensation in the latest financial year was down from $18.2 million in fiscal 2024, according to a proxy filing.
